msbt.message: Oh man, I was so excited about the Bug-Off that I couldn't sleep last night. Hope I don't fall asleep with the net in my hands today
It's almost time for the Bug-Off! I'm just pacing and twitching nervously to calm my nerves, obviously.
It's herethe big bug blowout The Bug-Off starts at 9:00 AM!Are you ready, ?

Now, the way I approach a typical Bug-Off is to try to get inside the head of a bug. What motivates the bug? What drives the bug to BE a bug? And that is how I CATCH the bug. Hey! Are you writing this all down or what?
Heya! You bringing in the bugs or what, ?
I still haven't found a bug with just the right FEEL, you know?Yes, I'm aware of how this contest works, thank you very much!
Wow, what an event. I want to thank the organizers, the fans, really everyone involved If anyone wants to interview me, I've got copies of my rider available and my own sound team.
I'm not really used to chasing anything, you know? I'm used to the paparazzi chasing me!
So, how'd you do in the Bug-Off?Me? Well, I don't like to measure my performance strictly in terms of "bugs caught," you know? I have my data team working on the analytics right now.
The Bug-Off is a delicate game of cat and mouse, you seeToday I was the cat, but you never know what tomorrow will bring.
Hey, I know I've got a lot of interesting things to say, but we're in the middle of the Bug-Off!
You know that feeling, when you catch the perfect bug? It's like, chills, you know! I also get the same feeling from picking out the right pair of shoes to wear, so maybe it's just me.

Bug catching is all about positioning. You've gotta be at just the right distance when you strike. If you do it just right, the bug will practically jump onto your net.But get too close, and he'll be on the next flight off this island!
Have you caught any cool-lookin' bugs yet, ?I'd tell you about the ones I netted, but I don't want to brag. I hope you understand, .
Oof! Who knew that bug catching would be so physically exhausting? Everything's sore, . But you know what that means Time for a bubble bath! Fancy bath salts, here I come!
Just between you and meI've never been a huge fan of, um, bugs.
You feel ready, ?It's the last Bug-Off of the season! Time to show everyone on this island what I'm really made of!
You might think I'm squeamish about bugs, but I actually think they're really interesting. The smallest ones sometimes have the fiercest spirit. And the most stylish designs, .
So some bugs are drawn to the light, right? And it's summer right now, Do you think some of these little guys are trying to get all the way to the sun?
If I were a butterfly, how would you catch me?Oh, I might as well tell you. A fresh batch of will snare me every time!

Don't get carried away just because this is a tournament, . It's like anything else in life. It's 2 percent preparation, 98 percent relaxation. The bugs practically catch themselvesDon't they? Come to think of it, I haven't caught anything
You might think I'm squeamish about bugs, but I actually think they're really interesting. The smallest ones sometimes have the fiercest spirit. And the most stylish designs, .
So some bugs are drawn to the light, right? And it's summer right now, Do you think some of these little guys are trying to get all the way to the sun?
If I were a butterfly, how would you catch me?Oh, I might as well tell you. A fresh batch of will snare me every time!

Don't get carried away just because this is a tournament, . It's like anything else in life. It's 2 percent preparation, 98 percent relaxation. The bugs practically catch themselvesDon't they? Come to think of it, I haven't caught anything
